data.text: @VodafoneUK Thank you @VodafoneUK  I will DM shortly  and hope you can not only resolve my issue but review your processes. The first two people I spoke too during my call today were good and understood my issues. But having to repeat everything multiple times later on was so not helpful.
@aaronconnolly12 @VodafoneUK They got back to me Aaron, known issues in the area

@VodafoneUK broadband down in Heswall, Wirral for about the last hour. Is there a network outage? Can you help? Tried all the recommended troubleshooting but appears to be an issue at the exchange or off my property.
@VodafoneUK Finally managed to talk to someone who was able to offer some explanation and offer a tentative timeframe for a fix. Fingers crossed that their best guess is right‚Ä¶

@VodafoneUK

@VodafoneUK Your web chat is an absolute joke. Over an hour being past pillar to post, being put everywhere except where I ask. Can you get a MANAGER to phone me? Someone from the UK. 4th time broadband has been cancelled and I'm left paying more than I need to be.

@DocRMills @VodafoneUK Hi Rachel, CityFibre does not provide internet services, we work with internet services providers to connect homes and business. For internet service-related queries, please contact your broadband provider. Thanks.

@RobIzzard @VodafoneUK @Trustpilot Hi Robert, we usually have multiple provider options. To find out which providers and services are available in your city visit and use our availability checker https://t.co/RnaGLvqgjc. Thanks.

@VodafoneUK surely this is a cruel joke? No explanation after nearly 2 months with no broadband, just ‚Äúit‚Äôs cancelled, dunno why‚Äù. Heartless and uncaring are word that come to mind to describe your customer service and service as a whole. Painful too. https://t.co/uVd6PtBPO7

@VodafoneUK so turns out, my phone battery was overheating because my USB plug was faulty so the charger was giving off a lot of heat! so after letting it cool down and pluging the wireless charger into a brand new @AnkerOfficial usb charger, worked a treat!
@timshutt @VodafoneUK @giffgaff That's cold. üòÇ
